articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Day 1 Highlights: India win medals in rowing, shooting, men's football team qualify for R16 - India Today
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 1 Highlights: India has won three medals in rowing, while clinching silver in the women's 10m air rifle team event. Meanwhile, India's women's cricket team defeated Bangladesh to book a spot in the final. India's men's hockey team thrashe…
articles.content:
India cannot afford to lose vs Myanmar if they want to qualify in the final 16 of the competition. India are coming off a gritty 1-0 win against Bangladesh.

articles.author: Singh Rahul Sunilkumar
articles.title: Esports debuts at Asian Games: PUBG to Dota 2, list of the seven medal sports - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asian Games in Hangzhou include seven esports games. Indian teams participate in League of Legends, FIFA Online 4, Dota 2, and Street Fighter V.
articles.content: The Asian Games, which began in Hangzhou, China on Saturday, feature athletes competing in a total of 481 events across various disciplines. This time, there is also the official inclusion of seven e… [+2498 chars]

articles.title: Asian Games: Unusual draw cannot stop the Nikhat Zareen juggernaut - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Two-time world champion Nikhat Zareen is unbeaten in two years and made light work of Worlds silver medallist Thi Tam Nguyen.
articles.content: World champion Nikhat Zareen began her Asian Games campaign against world silver medallist Thi Tam Nguyen on Sunday. While Nikhat won the bout, a match-up of this quality - between the two best boxer… [+2828 chars]
